Summary: very bright object with no faa lights
divs: sighting detailsi went out side to let my dog out and i live near philadelphia airport and i air plains all day long. this was not an air plain its was much brighter thats why it caught my eye. it seemed to be gaining altitude and coming closer to me at the same time it was not like any satellite i have ever seen and it was not a plane and made no should that i could hear and the it turned to a dim red and disappeared. i thought it might me the space station but i went on line and look up where its location was in real time and it was not visible at that time so it wasn't that. http:\\spaceflight.nasa.gov\realdata\tracking\
